configuration.mailchimp_subject_line: Self-serve blocks are back and in the dashboard, use Notion with balena, AI drones, and more
configuration.mailchimp_preview_text: Monthly updates on projects, features, and events from balena March 2022

featured.text:
Dear Reader,

When you log in to the balenaCloud dashboard, you’ll see Blocks are now a primary entity. We created Blocks, drop in chunks of functionality which are common across many IoT applications, to help jumpstart your IoT app development. Now you can add and manage blocks using all of the same tools you are familiar with for managing a fleet on balenaHub.

Also in this months email:

  • Tracking your habits with Notion and balena
  • Managing a fleet of AI drones with balena
  • Support for the latest NVIDIA Jetson L4t
  • New Hub projects and fleets, community highlighs and job opportunities

news.title: Track your habits and environment using Notion and balena
news.text: Learn how your environment is affecting your productivity by combining tracking your habits using Notion, a free for personal use online project tracking app, with a balena environment monitor.

news.title: How Lorenz Technology provisions and manages AI drone fleets
news.text: This month we are highlighting Lorenz Technology. Their mission is to simplify security and surveillance using a fleet of AI drones which collect, analyze, and share data in real time.

news.title: BalenaOS now supports the latest NVIDIA Jetson L4T
news.text: We have released L4T 32.6.1 - Jetpack 4.6 based OS images for devices in the Jetson Linux Driver Package which includes the Jetson Nano, TX2, TX2 NX, Xavier AGX, Xavier NX.

projects.title: BalenaSound’s 3rd anniversary is coming up
projects.text: Next month we will be hosting a virtual meetup for balenaSound users to celebrate 3 years of our most popular labs projects. Meet the community and have your say on the future of balenaSound, register to join us here.
